metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17942 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The convert_to_decimal function in vasnprintf.c in Gnulib before 2018-09-23 has a heap-based buffer overflow because memory is not allocated for a trailing '\0' character during %f processing.

criterions.comment: gnulib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
